amendment.description: To prohibit the consideration of a budget resolution that includes revenue increases while the civilian unemployment rate is above 5.5 percent, the administration's prediction for the unemployment rate without the stimulus.

action.text: Amendment SA 158 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Ayotte.

vote.text: Amendment SA 158 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 50.
